amendment.description: To provide critical funding to safeguard nuclear weapons and nuclear material in the United States and around the world.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 440 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 440 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S4677-4678; text: CR S4677-4678) To provide critical funding to safeguard nuclear weapons and nuclear material in the United States and around the world.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 440 proposed by Senator Reid.
